trans-unit.source: Most properties are dynamic; that means you can set them while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, and their values change without requiring a reboot of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>. In some cases, this change takes place immediately; in some cases, it takes place at the next connection.

seg-source.mrk: Most properties are dynamic; that means you can set them while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, and their values change without requiring a reboot of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
In some cases, this change takes place immediately; in some cases, it takes place at the next connection.

target.mrk: Most properties are dynamic; that means you can set them while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, and their values change without requiring a reboot of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
In some cases, this change takes place immediately; in some cases, it takes place at the next connection.

trans-unit.source: Some properties are static, which means changes to their values will not take effect while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running. You must restart or set them before (or while) starting <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: Some properties are static, which means changes to their values will not take effect while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running.
You must restart or set them before (or while) starting <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

target.mrk: Some properties are static, which means changes to their values will not take effect while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running.
You must restart or set them before (or while) starting <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
